meanings.definition: A device that allows different pieces of equipment to be connected or used together.
meanings.sent1: The adapter plugged into the computer and the printer to connect them.
meanings.sent2: I always carry an adapter when traveling to ensure I can charge my devices.
meanings.sent3: The adapter and the cable were best friends, always helping each other connect.
meanings.sent4: She was like an adapter in the office, bridging the gap between different departments.
meanings.sent5: The adapter acted as a magical bridge, bringing the old and new technology together.

meanings.definition: A person who adapts or modifies something.
meanings.sent1: As an adapter, he was skilled at finding creative solutions to problems.
meanings.sent2: The adapter adjusted the schedule to accommodate everyone's needs.
meanings.sent3: The adapter at the party made sure everyone was having a good time.
meanings.sent4: She was an adapter in the kitchen, always coming up with new recipes.
meanings.sent5: The adapter's ability to change and improve things was truly impressive.
